title: The Industry's Diversity Challenge
description: TD Ameritrade's Kate Healy discusses the lack of diversity in financial services, how advisors can attract young talent and engage young clients.
itunes:author: Barron's Advisor
itunes:summary: TD Ameritrade's Kate Healy discusses the lack of diversity in financial services, how advisors can attract young talent and engage young clients.
